ModMetaData.name: No Water Raids
ModMetaData.author: Laureeeeeeeeeeeeeeen
ModMetaData.description:
Disables emerge from water raid entry method. Works for both mechanoids and devourers.
If Tynan adds another freakish water-based raid to his game please let me know by creating a new topic in the discussion tab for this mod.
Load after any mod which adds new incidents/raids.
